name: Pluzzel
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE (no really it looks better in Fullscreen )
This is my first game jam.
And I know, the game is bad
The Genres of this game are Puzzel, Sandbox, Platformer.

Controlles: 

A - Left
D - Right
W or SPACE - Jump
Rightmouse Button - Place Platform
Move your mouse to position the Platform

Credits:

Brackeys - Audiomanager, Playermovement and Charactercontroller
SFXR - Soundeffects
Unity - Allowed me to waste 48 Hours
Visual Studio - I still hate you
Spotify - Reason why I even survived 12 Hours straight programming one script because I am bad at programming
Discord - Would have talked to the jamers, but I didn´t. They sounded real nice.
André C. - Mix and Gamejam Creator
Photoshop - Creating the Logo (you will never see it because it was ugly so I instantly deleted it(actually I redid it and it now looks okay so you will see the new version))
Windows - Why did you need to do a Windows Update at the last day
Google - You saved my live
My self - Ugly ass graphics  and shity music
